gameModeOff.firstParagraph: I have gained experience in UI design and front-end development through several side projects. I have a solid understanding of programming principles and can communicate effectively to ensure a clear and cohesive project workflow.
gameModeOff.secondParagraph: I currently live in Kęty, in Małopolska. In my free time, I enjoy going to the gym, running, watching hardware-related videos, and playing video games.

gameModeOn.firstParagraph: In the past year, I've played 20 different games. I used to play a lot of competetive games back in the day. I saw myself as a teamplayer who enjoyed leading my team to victory.
gameModeOn.secondParagraph: Currently, I prefer playing more casual games rather than focusing on competitive ones. I enjoy relaxing in the afternoons with my favorite game of the moment or revisiting my GOATS.
